column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////There's nothing wrong with Cafe Baba Reeba except Spanish Square on Belmont and Southport exists. Baba Rebaa's pintxos we're good
column2: especially the Chorizo wrap dates (which were amazing) but nothing else stood out. I can feel the quality but the parts don't add to the sum
column4: like they're trying to play it safe. Some extra salt and/or MSG might have done the job. The paella was generous with shrimp but that's it. I didn't see any other seafood. The bacon wrapped dates and the paella at Spanish Square are better.
